text: "Would I Lie to You?" is a 1992 debut single by Charles & Eddie. It was taken from debut studio album Duophonic. It went to number 1 in the United Kingdom, Zimbabwe, New Zealand, Germany and Austria, number 13 in the United States and number 3 in Australia and Canada. It was covered by David Guetta in 2016. ==Track listings== * 7" single # "Would I Lie to You?" (Radio Edit) – 3:41 # "Would I Lie to You?" (Club House Mix) – 5:04 * CD single # "Would I Lie to You?" (Radio Edit) – 3:41 # "Would I Lie to You?" (Club House Mix) – 5:04 * CD maxi single # "Would I Lie to You?" (Radio Edit) – 3:41 # "Would I Lie to You?" (Club House Mix) – 5:04 # "Would I Lie to You?" (Truth and Soul Mix) – 3:57 # "Would I Lie to You?" (Funky Way Extended Mix) – 5:01 ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:David Guetta songs Category:Soul songs
title: Would I Lie to You? (Charles & Eddie song)
